data.title: john meillon enterprises
data.meta_description: Thanks A Meillon! by Gauntlett, Frank; Gibson, Bunny and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text: Softcover. Condition: Very Good. First Edition. Size: 8vo Octavo (standard book size). 256 pages. Text body is clean, and free from previous owner annotation, underlining and highlighting. Binding is tight, covers and spine fully intact. No foxing detected in this copy. All edges clean, neat and free of foxing. Main title page has been removed. This book is available and will be shipped within two business days. All items are tracked and details are available on request. From the 1940s to his death in 1989 John Meillon was often cited as Australia's favorite actor - some say the best we ever had. He loved the grog, a yarn, the girls, his mates and acting - and Australia loved him back. Film, TV, radio and stage - knockabout larrikin Meillon triumphed in the lot. Meillon's story - with its amazing credits and stellar list of international co-conspirators - is told by Bunny Gibson and Frank Gauntlett with an introduction by best-selling author the late Bryce Courtenay. Award-winning actor, international skater, singer, comedienne, producer, businesswoman and now writer Bunny Gibson is probably best known for selling tonnes of margarine on TV as the unstoppable Rita The Eta Eater. Bunny and John were married for 18 years and together for two remarkable decades. Bunny tells the story of their curious compatibility and - as The Man himself said: "I may have been a nuisance but I've never been a bore!" Playwright, journalist and general textmaniac, Frank covers Meillon's incredible career from the Golden Age of radio to iconic screen star, from the abysmal lows to the delightful highs. Quantity Available: 1. Shipped Weight: Under 500 grams. Category: Film, Radio & Television; Australia; Biography & Autobiography. ISBN: 0646456571. ISBN/EAN: 9780646456577. Pictures of this item not already displayed here available upon request. Inventory No: 5461.
